content: In 2025, the city of Stenograd is ruled by the silent force of the Behavioral Compliance Index, a real-time system rewarding obedience and punishing dissent without a word. When its architect, Marek Halden, is found dead and key functions falter, the hardline Directorate seizes power, justifying harsh crackdowns to restore order—detaining protest leaders, tightening restrictions, and filling the city with stern propaganda. Yet resistance flickers; citizens adapt, sabotaging checkpoints while Council members feud behind the scenes. As unrest grows, Oksana Lintz and Rada Miskovic risk everything to expose Halden’s hidden ledger, revealing a history of secret BCI abuses and disappearances. The revelation ignites mass protests, drives councilors into hiding, and propels the people of Stenograd to reclaim control by forming an independent truth commission, marking a desperate, determined turning point against their city’s algorithmic oppression.
